column5: It's a bit late I know but I just thought I'd throw it out there. There's a small bass tournament this coming sunday on lake dalrymple, it's $25 per team to enter, 6 fish limit, first 2 teams get paid. There are only 15 teams allowed, all with motors under 80hp and canoes/kayaks. If anyone wants to team up let me know via PM and we can work out details, if you have a proper boat that's great otherwise we'll be using the canoe (with outriggers). Thanks!
Bump, if anyone's interested I need to know before the end of tomorrow.
This part has me thinking Chris  Canoe,no livewell. Is this a catch and keep or live release? Im thinking it,s a Trailer park tourny.
Brian they will allow a tuperware container/cooler with air pump from what I've heard.Something like you would use for your fish tank at home.
yup, live release, most people will have livewells but everyone else will use coolers/rubbermaid bins, I've fished them before and most fish seem to be quite healthy at the weigh in.
I'll have a bait bucket airator with it.
I like your determination. Good luck
Ok, if anyone wants in I need to know ASAP, the organizer will wait but I don't want to make him. Thanks, Chris.
Sorry bud. If I could . I would go check it out.  If you do find a partner I got a couple lures for you to try.
Ah, those are the lures you meant, for sure!
Did you manage to get in the tourney?
